thread.section_title: Apex Temple Court Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (London, England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Lovely hotel
thread.title_full: Lovely hotel - Review of Apex Temple Court Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: DomiVRN
title: Lovely hotel
text:
Lovely hotel in the heart of "The city"!
The room is really nice, as well as the bathroom (there were both bathtub and a big shower), even if I have to say that the lighting isn't the best for doing your makeup; not a major fault though!
The location is not the best if you want to visit London as it is rather far from the main monuments, but we choose it because it was close to a friend's home.
Last but not least, all of the staff we dealt with has been real nice and ready to satisfy any request (when we checked in we wanted to be at a higher floor and the lady at the desk let us choose the new room at the floor we preferred).
